metadata.title: CVE-2023-45236 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description: EDK2's Network Package is susceptible to a predictable TCP Initial SequenceNumber. This vulnerability can be exploited by an attacker to gain unauthorizedaccess and potentially lead to a loss of Confidentiality.

criterions.comment: edk2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
